properties.specdatatypedefinitions:
<schema xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <complexType name="crewInfoType">
    <sequence>
      <element name="singleCrewInfo" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded">
        <complexType>
          <sequence>
            <element name="role" type="string" />
            <element name="firstName" type="string" />
            <element name="lastName" type="string" />
            <element name="contactNo" type="string" />
            <element name="email" type="string" />
          </sequence>
        </complexType>
      </element>
    </sequence>
  </complexType>
  <complexType name="castInfoType">
    <sequence>
      <element name="singleCastInfo" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded">
        <complexType>
          <sequence>
            <element name="character" type="string" />
            <element name="artist" type="string" />
            <element name="agent" type="string" />
            <element name="agentContactNo" type="string" />
          </sequence>
        </complexType>
      </element>
    </sequence>
  </complexType>
  <complexType name="locationInfoType">
    <sequence>
      <element name="singleLocationInfo" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded">
        <complexType>
          <sequence>
            <element name="locationID" type="string" />
            <element name="locationName" type="string" />
            <element name="address" type="string" />
            <element name="UBDMapRef" type="string" />
            <element name="parking" type="string" />
            <element name="unit" type="string" />
            <element name="police" type="string" />
            <element name="hospital" type="string" />
            <element name="contact" type="string" />
            <element name="contactNo" type="string" />
            <element name="locationNotes" type="string" />
          </sequence>
        </complexType>
      </element>
    </sequence>
  </complexType>
  <complexType name="generalInfoType">
    <sequence>
      <element name="production" type="string" />
      <element name="date" type="date" />
      <element name="weekday" type="string" />
      <element name="shootDayNo" type="integer" />
    </sequence>
  </complexType>
  <complexType name="shootingScheduleType">
    <sequence>
      <element name="lastUpdatedDate" type="date" />
      <element name="director" type="string" />
      <element name="producer" type="string" />
      <element name="startDate" type="date" />
      <element name="scheduledFinish" type="date" />
      <element name="revisedFinish" type="date" minOccurs="0" />
      <element name="scheduledShootingDays" type="integer" />
      <element name="singleDaySchedule" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded">
        <complexType>
          <sequence>
            <element name="shootDayNo" type="integer" />
            <element name="shootDayDate" type="date" />
            <element name="shootDayWeekday" type="string" />
            <element name="crewCall" type="time" />
            <element name="travelToLoc" type="time" />
            <element name="bumpIn" type="time" minOccurs="0" />
            <element name="startDayNotes" type="string" minOccurs="0" />
            <element name="sceneSchedule" maxOccurs="unbounded">
              <complexType>
                <sequence>
                  <element name="scene" type="string" />
                  <element name="pageTime">
                    <complexType>
                      <sequence>
                        <element name="number" type="integer" />
                        <element name="numerator" type="integer" />
                      </sequence>
                    </complexType>
                  </element>
                  <element name="D_N" type="string" />
                  <element name="IN_EX" type="string" />
                  <element name="locationID" type="string" />
                  <element name="set" type="string" />
                  <element name="address" type="string" />
                  <element name="synopsis" type="string" />
                  <element name="characters">
                    <complexType>
                      <sequence>
                        <element name="character" maxOccurs="unbounded" type="string" />
                      </sequence>
                    </complexType>
                  </element>
                  <element name="estShootTimes" type="string" />
                  <element name="estScriptTiming" type="time" />
                  <element name="setRequirements">
                    <complexType>
                      <sequence>
                        <element name="singleEntry" maxOccurs="unbounded">
                          <complexType>
                            <sequence>
                              <element name="item" type="string" />
                              <element name="requirements" type="string" />
                            </sequence>
                          </complexType>
                        </element>
                      </sequence>
                    </complexType>
                  </element>
                  <element name="mealBreak" minOccurs="0">
                    <complexType>
                      <sequence>
                        <element name="meal" type="string" />
                        <element name="break" type="string" />
                      </sequence>
                    </complexType>
                  </element>
                </sequence>
              </complexType>
            </element>
            <element name="endDayNotes" type="string" />
            <element name="totalScriptPages">
              <complexType>
                <sequence>
                  <element name="number" type="integer" />
                  <element name="numerator" type="integer" />
                </sequence>
              </complexType>
            </element>
          </sequence>
        </complexType>
      </element>
    </sequence>
  </complexType>
  <complexType name="callSheetType">
    <sequence>
      <element name="productionOffice">
        <complexType>
          <sequence>
            <element name="address" type="string" />
            <element name="phone" type="string" />
            <element name="fax" type="string" />
            <element name="email" type="string" />
          </sequence>
        </complexType>
      </element>
      <element name="emergencyInfo">
        <complexType>
          <sequence>
            <element name="fireAmbulance" type="string" />
            <element name="hospital" type="string" />
            <element name="police" type="string" />
          </sequence>
        </complexType>
      </element>
      <element name="director" type="string" />
      <element name="producer" type="string" />
      <element name="productionManager" type="string" maxOccurs="unbounded" />
      <element name="firstAD" type="string" />
      <element name="sunrise" type="string" />
      <element name="sunset" type="string" />
      <element name="weather" type="string" />
      <element name="callTimes">
        <complexType>
          <sequence>
            <element name="crewCall">
              <complexType>
                <sequence>
                  <element name="callTime" type="time" />
                  <element name="callLoc" type="string" minOccurs="0" />
                </sequence>
              </complexType>
            </element>
            <element name="locationCall">
              <complexType>
                <sequence>
                  <element name="callTime" type="time" />
                  <element name="callLoc" type="string" minOccurs="0" />
                </sequence>
              </complexType>
            </element>
            <element name="makeupHair">
              <complexType>
                <sequence>
                  <element name="callTime" type="time" />
                  <element name="callLoc" type="string" minOccurs="0" />
                </sequence>
              </complexType>
            </element>
            <element name="wardrobe">
              <complexType>
                <sequence>
                  <element name="callTime" type="time" />
                  <element name="callLoc" type="string" minOccurs="0" />
                </sequence>
              </complexType>
            </element>
            <element name="unit">
              <complexType>
                <sequence>
                  <element name="callTime" type="time" />
                  <element name="callLoc" type="string" minOccurs="0" />
                </sequence>
              </complexType>
            </element>
            <element name="other" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded">
              <complexType>
                <sequence>
                  <element name="call" type="string" />
                  <element name="callTime" type="time" />
                  <element name="callLoc" type="string" minOccurs="0" />
                </sequence>
              </complexType>
            </element>
            <element name="breakfast">
              <complexType>
                <sequence>
                  <element name="from" type="time" />
                  <element name="to" type="time" />
                  <element name="callLoc" type="string" minOccurs="0" />
                </sequence>
              </complexType>
            </element>
          </sequence>
        </complexType>
      </element>
      <element name="wrapTimes">
        <complexType>
          <sequence>
            <element name="estWrap" type="string" />
            <element name="other" minOccurs="0">
              <complexType>
                <sequence>
                  <element name="wrap" type="string" />
                  <element name="wrapTime" type="string" />
                </sequence>
              </complexType>
            </element>
          </sequence>
        </complexType>
      </element>
      <element name="location">
        <complexType>
          <sequence>
            <element name="singleLocation" maxOccurs="unbounded">
              <complexType>
                <sequence>
                  <element name="locationName" type="string" />
                  <element name="address" type="string" />
                  <element name="contact" type="string" />
                  <element name="contactNo" type="string" />
                  <element name="UBDMapRef" type="string" />
                  <element name="locationNotes" type="string" />
                </sequence>
              </complexType>
            </element>
          </sequence>
        </complexType>
      </element>
      <element name="dailySchedule">
        <complexType>
          <sequence>
            <element name="startDayNotes" type="string" />
            <element name="sceneSchedule" maxOccurs="unbounded">
              <complexType>
                <sequence>
                  <element name="scene" type="string" />
                  <element name="pageTime">
                    <complexType>
                      <sequence>
                        <element name="number" type="integer" />
                        <element name="numerator" type="integer" />
                      </sequence>
                    </complexType>
                  </element>
                  <element name="estScriptTiming" type="time" />
                  <element name="D_N" type="string" />
                  <element name="IN_EX" type="string" />
                  <element name="setLocation" type="string" />
                  <element name="synopsis" type="string" />
                  <element name="artistTimeInfo" maxOccurs="unbounded">
                    <complexType>
                      <sequence>
                        <element name="character" type="string" />
                        <element name="artist" type="string" />
                        <element name="pickup" type="string" minOccurs="0" />
                        <element name="makeup" type="string" minOccurs="0" />
                        <element name="wardrobe" type="string" minOccurs="0" />
                        <element name="onSet" type="string" />
                      </sequence>
                    </complexType>
                  </element>
                  <element name="estShootTimes" type="string" />
                  <element name="sceneNotes" type="string" />
                  <element name="mealBreak" minOccurs="0">
                    <complexType>
                      <sequence>
                        <element name="meal" type="string" />
                        <element name="break" type="string" />
                      </sequence>
                    </complexType>
                  </element>
                </sequence>
              </complexType>
            </element>
            <element name="endDayNotes" type="string" />
            <element name="totalScriptPages">
              <complexType>
                <sequence>
                  <element name="number" type="integer" />
                  <element name="numerator" type="integer" />
                </sequence>
              </complexType>
            </element>
          </sequence>
        </complexType>
      </element>
      <element name="dailySetRequirements">
        <complexType>
          <sequence>
            <element name="singleEntry" maxOccurs="unbounded">
              <complexType>
                <sequence>
                  <element name="item" type="string" />
                  <element name="description" maxOccurs="unbounded">
                    <complexType>
                      <sequence>
                        <element name="scene" type="string" />
                        <element name="requirements" type="string" />
                      </sequence>
                    </complexType>
                  </element>
                </sequence>
              </complexType>
            </element>
          </sequence>
        </complexType>
      </element>
      <element name="unit" type="string" minOccurs="0" />
      <element name="additionalEquipment" type="string" minOccurs="0" />
      <element name="additionalCrew" type="string" minOccurs="0" />
      <element name="directions" type="string" minOccurs="0" />
      <element name="parking" type="string" minOccurs="0" />
      <element name="catering" minOccurs="0">
        <complexType>
          <sequence>
            <element name="singleMeal" maxOccurs="unbounded">
              <complexType>
                <sequence>
                  <element name="meal" type="string" />
                  <element name="break" type="string" />
                  <element name="serveNo" type="string" />
                  <element name="location" type="string" />
                </sequence>
              </complexType>
            </element>
          </sequence>
        </complexType>
      </element>
      <element name="productionNotes" type="string" minOccurs="0" />
      <element name="castTransport" type="string" minOccurs="0" />
      <element name="locationCrewNotes" type="string" minOccurs="0" />
      <element name="lunchPickup" type="string" minOccurs="0" />
      <element name="exposedRushes" type="string" minOccurs="0" />
      <element name="rushesScreening" type="string" minOccurs="0" />
      <element name="crewAgreements" type="string" minOccurs="0" />
      <element name="advancedSchedule" minOccurs="0">
        <complexType>
          <sequence>
            <element name="shootDayNo" type="integer" />
            <element name="shootDayDate" type="date" />
            <element name="shootDayWeekday" type="string" />
            <element name="adSceneSchedule" maxOccurs="unbounded">
              <complexType>
                <sequence>
                  <element name="scene" type="string" />
                  <element name="pageTime">
                    <complexType>
                      <sequence>
                        <element name="number" type="integer" />
                        <element name="numerator" type="integer" />
                      </sequence>
                    </complexType>
                  </element>
                  <element name="D_N" type="string" />
                  <element name="IN_EX" type="string" />
                  <element name="setSynopsis" type="string" />
                  <element name="location" type="string" />
                  <element name="characters">
                    <complexType>
                      <sequence>
                        <element name="character" maxOccurs="unbounded" type="string" />
                      </sequence>
                    </complexType>
                  </element>
                </sequence>
              </complexType>
            </element>
          </sequence>
        </complexType>
      </element>
      <element name="additionalNotes" type="string" minOccurs="0" />
    </sequence>
  </complexType>
  <complexType name="continuityInfoType">
    <sequence>
      <element name="sceneInfo" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded">
        <complexType>
          <sequence>
            <element name="scene" type="string" />
            <element name="slateInfo" maxOccurs="unbounded">
              <complexType>
                <sequence>
                  <element name="slate" type="string" />
                  <element name="takeInfo" maxOccurs="unbounded">
                    <complexType>
                      <sequence>
                        <element name="take" type="string" />
                        <element name="duration" type="time" />
                        <element name="directorChoice" type="boolean" />
                        <element name="print" type="boolean" />
                        <element name="comments" type="string" />
                        <element name="camRoll" type="string" />
                        <element name="soundRoll" type="string" />
                      </sequence>
                    </complexType>
                  </element>
                </sequence>
              </complexType>
            </element>
          </sequence>
        </complexType>
      </element>
      <element name="remarks" type="string" />
    </sequence>
  </complexType>
  <complexType name="continuityDailyReportType">

      <element name="accidents_delays" type="string" />
      <element name="catering">
        <complexType>
          <sequence>
            <element name="singleMeal" maxOccurs="unbounded">
              <complexType>
                <sequence>
                  <element name="meal" type="string" />
                  <element name="time" type="time" />
                  <element name="numbers" type="integer" />
                  <element name="location" type="string" />
                </sequence>
              </complexType>
            </element>
          </sequence>
        </complexType>
      </element>
      <element name="generalRemarks" type="string" />
    </sequence>
  </complexType>
  <complexType name="pageTimeType">
    <sequence>
      <element name="number" type="integer" />
      <element name="numerator" type="integer" />
    </sequence>
  </complexType>
  <complexType name="scriptTimingType">
    <sequence>
      <element name="scenes" type="integer" />
      <element name="pageTime">
        <complexType>
          <sequence>
            <element name="number" type="integer" />
            <element name="numerator" type="integer" />
          </sequence>
        </complexType>
      </element>
      <element name="estTiming" type="time" />
      <element name="actualTiming" type="time" />
    </sequence>
  </complexType>
  <complexType name="stockInfoType">
    <sequence>
      <element name="loaded" type="integer" />
      <element name="gross" type="integer" />
      <element name="exposed" type="integer" />
      <element name="print" type="integer" />
      <element name="N_G" type="integer" />
      <element name="waste" type="integer" />
      <element name="shortEnds" type="integer" />
    </sequence>
  </complexType>
  <complexType name="crewMemberType">
    <sequence>
      <element name="producer" type="string" />
      <element name="director" type="string" />
      <element name="productionManager" type="string" maxOccurs="unbounded" />
      <element name="DOP" type="string" />
      <element name="editor" type="string" />
      <element name="continuity" type="string" />
      <element name="soundRecordist" type="string" />
      <element name="cameraOperator" type="string" />
      <element name="cameraAssistant" type="string" />
      <element name="firstAD" type="string" />
      <element name="secondAD" type="string" />
    </sequence>
  </complexType>
  <complexType name="callSheetNotesType">
    <sequence>
      <element name="additionalEquipment" type="string" minOccurs="0" />
      <element name="additionalCrew" type="string" minOccurs="0" />
      <element name="directions" type="string" minOccurs="0" />
      <element name="productionNotes" type="string" minOccurs="0" />
      <element name="locationCrewNotes" type="string" minOccurs="0" />
      <element name="lunchPickup" type="string" minOccurs="0" />
      <element name="exposedRushes" type="string" minOccurs="0" />
      <element name="rushesScreening" type="string" minOccurs="0" />
      <element name="crewAgreements" type="string" minOccurs="0" />
      <element name="additionalNotes" type="string" minOccurs="0" />
    </sequence>
  </complexType>
  <complexType name="productionOfficeType">
    <sequence>
      <element name="address" type="string" />
      <element name="phone" type="string" />
      <element name="fax" type="string" />
      <element name="email" type="string" />
    </sequence>
  </complexType>
</schema>
properties.specdescription: Automation of film production process on daily basis
